    Publications

    Efficient Radius-bounded Community Search in Geo-social Networks

    Published in IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering, 2020

    Recommended citation: K. Wang, S. Wang, X. Cao and L. Qin, "Efficient Radius-bounded Community Search in Geo-social Networks," in IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering, doi: 10.1109/TKDE.2020.3040172. https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/8509251/

    Efficient and Effective Community Search on Large-scale Bipartite Graphs

    Published in arXiv preprint arXiv:2011.08399, 2020

    Recommended citation: Wang, K., Zhang, W., Lin, X., Zhang, Y., Qin, L., & Zhang, Y. (2020). Efficient and Effective Community Search on Large-scale Bipartite Graphs. arXiv preprint arXiv:2011.08399. https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.08399

    Efficient Graph Hierarchical Decomposition with User Engagement and Tie Strength

    Published in International Conference on Database Systems for Advanced Applications, 2020

    Recommended citation: Ghafouri, M., Wang, K., Zhang, F., Zhang, Y., & Lin, X. (2020, September). Efficient Graph Hierarchical Decomposition with User Engagement and Tie Strength. In International Conference on Database Systems for Advanced Applications (pp. 448-465). Springer, Cham. https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-3-030-59416-9_27

    Efficient bitruss decomposition for large-scale bipartite graphs

    Published in 2020 IEEE 36th International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE), 2020

    Recommended citation: K. Wang, X. Lin, L. Qin, W. Zhang and Y. Zhang, "Efficient Bitruss Decomposition for Large-scale Bipartite Graphs," 2020 IEEE 36th International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE), Dallas, TX, USA, 2020, pp. 661-672, doi: 10.1109/ICDE48307.2020.00063. https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/9101358/

    Vertex Priority Based Butterfly Counting for Large-scale Bipartite Networks

    Published in PVLDB, 2019

    Recommended citation: Kai Wang, Xuemin Lin, Lu Qin, Wenjie Zhang, and Ying Zhang. 2019. Vertex priority based butterfly counting for large-scale bipartite networks. Proc. VLDB Endow. 12, 10 (June 2019), 1139–1152. DOI:https://doi.org/10.14778/3339490.3339497 https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.14778/3339490.3339497

    Efficient computing of radius-bounded k-cores

    Published in 2018 IEEE 34th International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE), 2018

    Recommended citation: Wang, K., Cao, X., Lin, X., Zhang, W., & Qin, L. (2018, April). Efficient computing of radius-bounded k-cores. In 2018 IEEE 34th International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE) (pp. 233-244). IEEE. https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/8509251/

    Efficient motif discovery in spatial trajectories using discrete fréchet distance

    Published in EDBT, 2017

    Recommended citation: Tang, B., Yiu, M. L., Mouratidis, K., & Wang, K. (2017). Efficient motif discovery in spatial trajectories using discrete fréchet distance. EDBT. http://ink.library.smu.edu.sg/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=4635&context=sis_research
